name: CVE-2021-33164
description: Improper access control in BIOS firmware for some Intel(R) NUCs before version INWHL357.0046 may allow a privileged user to potentially enable escalation of privilege via local access.
pattern: [((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:intel:nuc_8_mainstream-g_kit_nuc8i7inh_firmware:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:intel:nuc_8_mainstream-g_kit_nuc8i7inh:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')) OR ((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:intel:nuc_8_mainstream-g_mini_pc_nuc8i7inh_firmware:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:intel:nuc_8_mainstream-g_mini_pc_nuc8i7inh:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')) OR ((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:intel:nuc_8_mainstream-g_kit_nuc8i5inh_firmware:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:intel:nuc_8_mainstream-g_kit_nuc8i5inh:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')) OR ((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:intel:nuc_8_mainstream-g_mini_pc_nuc8i5inh_firmware:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:intel:nuc_8_mainstream-g_mini_pc_nuc8i5inh:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*'))]

external_references.description: This object was created using cve2stix from the Signals Corps.
